description: Have you ever found yourself developing a tool only to find it already exists somewhere else in the code? Have you ever wondered what does AlexsCoolFunction do? Did you ever put a funny comment in your code and was upset that noone will read it? Then maybe it’s time to have a better documentation system! Join me for this tutorial, where we will sail through the onboarding stage of Sphinx - an automated documentation package, and learn how we can all collaborate better.
title: Help your colleagues help themselves - a Sphinx tutorial
